text: Cnodalia is a genus of Asian orb-weaver spiders first described by Tamerlan Thorell in 1890. ==Species== it contains four species: *Cnodalia ampliabdominis (Song, Zhang & Zhu, 2006) – China *Cnodalia flavescens Mi, Peng & Yin, 2010 – China *Cnodalia harpax Thorell, 1890 – Indonesia (Sumatra), Japan *Cnodalia quadrituberculata Mi, Peng & Yin, 2010 – China ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Asia Category:Taxa named by Tamerlan Thorell
title: Cnodalia
